description._content: Image taken from: Title: "1792. La guerre dans les environs de Lille, 28 avril au 23 novembre. Le bombardement de Lille, 24 septembre au 8 octobre. Documents militaires et anecdotiques recueillis dans un journal de l'époque [i.e. the “Gazette du département du Nord”], mis en ordre avec avertissement et notes, par E. Debièvre" Author: DEBIÈVRE, Eugène. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9226.k.19." Page: 289 Place of Publishing: Lille Date of Publishing: 1892 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000888231 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
